Title: Part 2: The Way to Rivendell
Text:
After Gandalf was not at the Inn, I was sent to Rivendell by a ranger named Aragorn.

He said he was a friend of Gandalf and I had no choice but to trust him!

The path should take me past old Wethertop and also Bilbo's stone trolls.

I have to watch out for the Ringwraiths! They guard the area!

I hope Lord Elrond knows what to do!

(Side Quest at Weathertop)
CompleteText:
You've made it to Rivendell and found the Council of Lord Elrond!
Place the One Ring on the center table and talk to everyone present.
